mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOSMO_MEMBER(KMNUM, KMID, KMPW, KMNAME, KMHP , KMEMAIL, KMZONE, KMROAD, KMROAD2 ,KMJIBUN, KMIMAGE, MDELETEYN, MINSERTDATE, MUPDATEDATE) VALUES (#{kmnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmpw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmhp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmzone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmroad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmroad2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmjibun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kmimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT*FROM( SELECT A.KMNUM AS KMNUM , A.KMID AS KMID , A.KMPW AS KMPW , A.KMNAME AS KMNAMEAS , A.KMHP AS KMHP , A.KMEMAIL AS KMEMAIL , A.KMZONE AS KMZONE , A.KMROAD AS KMROAD , A.KMROAD2 AS KMROAD2 ,A.KMJIBUN AS KMJIBUN , A.KMIMAGE AS KMIMAGE , A.MDELETEYN AS MDELETEYN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MINSERTDATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MUPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MUPDATEDATE ,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.KMNUM)/ #{pageSize} ) AS pageSize ,COUNT( A.KMNUM) OVER() AS totalCount FROM KOSMO_MEMBER A WHERE MDELETEYN='Y' ) WHERE PAGESIZE=#{curPage}

SELECT A.KMNUM AS KMNUM , A.KMID AS KMID , A.KMPW AS KMPW , A.KMNAME AS KMNAME , A.KMHP AS KMHP , A.KMEMAIL AS KMEMAIL , A.KMZONE AS KMZONE , A.KMROAD AS KMROAD , A.KMROAD2 AS KMROAD2 ,A.KMJIBUN AS KMJIBUN , A.KMIMAGE AS KMIMAGE , A.MDELETEYN AS MDELETEYN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MINSERTDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MINSERTDATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MUPDATEDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MUPDATEDATE FROM KOSMO_MEMBER A WHERE MDELETEYN='Y' AND A.KMNUM=#{kmnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
